message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a truly unique and valuable piece, and I believe this price reflects its worth.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $12000 or less. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $12000 is closer to my desired price, I can't quite go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13500. This would still allow you to get a great deal while also ensuring I receive a fair value for my product.
